DOC.brief_title: Acute Kidney Injury Renal Recovery After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Acute kidney injury ( AKI ) occur approximately one-third patient undergo cardiac surgery ( CS ) , represent one significant negative predictor patient outcome population . The investigator seek examine prevalence AKI , renal recovery development de-novo chronic kidney disease patient undergoing cardiac surgery ( elective/emergent ) San Bortolo Hospital , Italy November 2014 - October 2015 .
DOC.criteria: Adult cardiac surgery 1 . Missing data baseline serum creatinine ( define serum creatinine value within 90 365 day prior surgery ) miss serum creatinine value > 3 month surgery ( minimum two value ) 2 . Stage 5 chronic kidney disease ( estimate glomerular filtration rate < 15 ml/min/1.73 m2 receipt chronic dialysis )
